survey.name: Survey
survey.res: Packed full of nutritional good stuff
Pure goodness from the Australian land
We work with closely with Australian farmers
No artificial colours, flavours or preservatives
Ingredients grown without the use of any pesticides

samplesource.title: Open Survey
samplesource.invalid: You are missing information in the URL. Please verify the URL with the original invite.
samplesource.completed: It seems you have already entered this survey.
samplesource.exit: Thank you for your time, unfortunately you do not qualify for this survey today.

Thank you for your interest. However, at this time, we are looking for survey respondents who fit a different profile. Please do not be discouraged, as there may be future studies to which you will be invited to participate.
Thank you. You have now qualified to complete the remainder of the survey. Just a reminder the survey will take approximately 20 minutes to complete. Your answers will remain strictly confidential.
Thank you for taking our survey.

text.label: VFC1
text.verify:wrongTxt_1: You’ve entered a wrong numbers or alphabets. Please enter the correct number or alphabet again. You can try 2 more times
text.verify:wrongTxt_2: You’ve entered a wrong numbers or alphabets. Please enter the correct number or alphabet again. You can try 1 more time.
text.title:
Before you proceed to the survey, please complete the following security check question.
Please enter the text in the image.
If you can’t read text, please click on the image to refresh.
If you would like to hear the text read aloud, please click the speaker icon

survey.exec: checkQC.val=0 if str(VFC1.val)=='Verificationfailed': checkQC.val=1 print str(VFC1.val)

radio.label: checkQC
radio.title: RECORD QUILITY OR NOT FROM QC

survey.html:
Welcome to our survey!
The survey will take around 20 minutes for you to complete, but before we start we'd like to remind you that the company sponsoring this survey relies upon the results to make key business decisions. It's therefore very important that you provide considered and accurate responses.
At the end of the survey we'll ask you to verify a number of your answers for quality checking purposes therefore please answer honestly and with consideration.

radio.label: QC1
radio.title: Are you happy to proceed?

survey.html: Firstly, a few quick questions to make sure we're surveying a good cross-section of the population.

checkbox.label: S1
checkbox.title: Do you or any of your immediate family work in any of the following industries?

term.cond: (S1.r1 or S1.r2 or S1.r3 or S1.r4)

number.label: S2
number.title: How old are you?
number.comment: Please write your age in the box provided

radio.label: S3
radio.title: Are you?

radio.label: S2b
radio.title: HIDDEN QUESTION: AGE BANDS

text.label: S4
text.title: Please type in your postcode:

radio.label: S4b
radio.title: Hidden to capture State
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW

radio.label: S4c
radio.title: Hidden to capture REGION

radio.label: S4d
radio.title: Hidden to capture REGION or State

radio.label: S4e
radio.title: Hidden to capture RA

radio.label: S5
radio.title: Do you have children, either living in your household or out of home?

radio.label: S6
radio.title: Which of the following best describes the household you live in?
radio.comment: Please select the one answer that most applies.
radio.row: Live in a shared adult household
Live with my partner and children

checkbox.label: S7
checkbox.title: Which of the following age groups do your children living at home fall into?

radio.label: S7b
radio.title: LIFE STAGE

checkbox.label: S8
checkbox.title: Which of the following have you bought in the last 12 months for yourself or someone in your household?
checkbox.row: Snack bars (e.g. muesli, nut, oat bars)
Savoury biscuits (e.g. rice crackers, flavoured crackers)
Ready to eat/drink protein products (e.g. protein shakes, bars)
Fresh cow's milk (incl. lactose free) found in the refrigerator
Barista coffee (e.g. from a café, restaurant or other food outlet)
Packaged coffee (e.g. instant, coffee pods/capsules, roast & ground, sachets)

checkbox.label: S8b
checkbox.title: Which if the following plant-based milk types have you bought in the last 12 months?

checkbox.label: S9
checkbox.title: Looking at the following list of brands, which have you ever heard of?

checkbox.label: S10
checkbox.title: Which of these have you bought in the last 12 months?

checkbox.label: Record_S10
checkbox.title: TRACK THOSE WHO HAVE BOUGHT AO IN THE LAST 12 MONTHS (S10=1)

title.span: How frequently do you purchase these products?

select.comment: Click or drag each item into a rank position.

title.span:
Which, if any, of the following statements would you associate with each brand?

checkbox.row: The best alternative milk for coffee

checkbox.title: Which of these have you bought in the last 12 months?

checkbox.title: Which of these have you bought in the last 12 months?

radio.label: A5a
radio.title: And which of these brands do you purchase most often?

radio.label: A7
radio.title: To what extent do you agree or disagree with each of the below about Australia’s Own?
radio.comment: Please select one in each row

number.label: A8_Version
number.title: A8 - MaxDiff Version

radio.label: A8_[loopvar: task]
radio.title: We’re going to show you a number of different ways that Australia’s Own could talk about their range of plant based milks. In each scenario, please choose which of these would be MOST LIKELY to influence you to buy Australia’s Own over another brand, and which would LEAST influence you to buy Australia’s Own
radio.exec: setupMaxDiffItemsA( A8_md, "v%d_t%d" % (A8_Version.val, [loopvar: task]), A8_[loopvar: task], "A8") p.MDcount = str(A8_md_loop_expanded.order.index([loopvar: task]-1)+1)

radio.label: A9a
radio.title: If the Australia’s Own range of plant based milks were no longer organic, how would this impact your likelihood to buy them

textarea.label: A9b
textarea.title: Why is that?
textarea.comment: Please be as specific as possible

radio.label: A10
radio.title: And if the range of Australia’s Own plant based milks were no longer organic, would it change any of these? Your previous responses are shown below, you are able to change these if your pereptions have changed.

survey.html:
We’re now going to show you a variety of new product ideas, one at a time. You will be asked make a choice on whether you find it appealing or not. Below are instructions on how to do so wether taking the survey on a desktop or on a mobile device:
Laptop: Please click and drag the image to the left or the right
Mobile device: Please swipe the image to the left or the right.
 
SHOW THE BELOW TEXT IN A LARGER FONT AND IN BOLD
LEFT = Not Appealing                 RIGHT = Appealing
 
Please read each idea fully before you make your selection. The option to make your choice will be disabled for the first few seconds to allow time to fully read the text.
Click Continue when you are ready to start<strike>.</strike>

radio.label: swipe_B

row.label: r1
row.alt: Australia's Own Barista Oat Iced Latte

row.label: r10
row.alt: Australia's Own a2 Lactose Free Milk

survey.html: We are now going to ask you some more questions about 5 product ideas you have previously seen.

block.label: b2
block.builder:title: default loop block
block.html: We are now going to show you another product idea.
We are now going to show you another product idea.
We are now going to show you one last product idea.

textarea.label: D1_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title: Please tell us all the things that you particularly like about this product idea?
textarea.comment: Please be as specific as possible

textarea.label: D2_[loopvar: label]
textarea.title: Please tell us all the things that you particularly dislike about this product idea?
textarea.comment: Please be as specific as possible

radio.label: D3_[loopvar: label]
radio.title: How new and different do you feel this product is to what you can already buy today?
radio.row: Not at all new and different

radio.label: D4_[loopvar: label]
radio.title: How likely would you be to buy it if it was available where you usually shop, at a reasonable price?
radio.row: Neither likely nor unlikely to buy

radio.label: D5_[loopvar: label]
radio.title: How exciting do you find this product?

radio.label: D6_[loopvar: label]
radio.title: How relevant do you find this product?

radio.label: D7_[loopvar: label]
radio.title: How believable do you find what you’ve been told about this product?

radio.label: D8_[loopvar: label]
radio.title: How well does this product fit with what you expect from Australia’s Own?

radio.label: D10_[loopvar: label]
radio.title: So you previously mentioned you would be [pipe: D4_[loopvar: label]] this product idea. If this were priced at [loopvar: var1] how likely would you be to buy it?
radio.row: Neither likely nor unlikely to buy

radio.label: D11_[loopvar: label]
radio.title: Would you buy this product instead of or in addition to the other brands that you currently buy?
radio.row: Buy instead of some of the brands I currently buy
Buy in addition to the brands I currently buy

checkbox.label: D12_[loopvar: label]
checkbox.title: Which brands would you buy this instead of?

survey.html: We would now like to ask you a few further questions about organic products.

radio.label: E3
radio.title: How well would you say you understand what each of these statements means?

textarea.label: E2a
textarea.title: What does the the term organic mean to you?
textarea.comment: Please be as specific as possible

textarea.label: E2b
textarea.title: What does the the term certified organic mean to you?
textarea.comment: Please be as specific as possible

radio.label: E3a
radio.title: Do you think there is a difference between a product being organic and being certified organic?

textarea.label: E3b
textarea.title: What would you say is the difference between products that are organic and those that are certified organic?
textarea.comment: Please be as specific as possible

radio.label: E4a
radio.title: How often do you buy products that are organic?

checkbox.label: E4b
checkbox.title: Which of the following products do you buy that are organic?

radio.label: E4c
radio.title: If a brand of plant based milk was organic, would this impact your likelihood to purchase it?
radio.row: I would be a lot more likely to purchase the brand making this claim
I would be a little more likely to purchase the brand making this claim
It wouldn't change which brand I would purchase
I would be a little less likely to purchase the brand making this claim
I would be a lot less likely to purchase the brand making this claim

radio.label: E5a
radio.title: Have you seen this logo before today?

radio.label: E5b
radio.title: When you do buy organic products, how important is it that they are not just organic but ‘Certified Organic’?

radio.label: Z1
radio.title: Which of the following best describes your current employment status?
radio.row: Not employed, but looking for work
Not employed, and not looking for work

pipe.label: Z2_text
pipe.case: Which of the following best describes your occupation?
Which of the following best describes the type of occupation you are qualified for?
Which of the following best describes your occupation before you retired?
Which of the following best describes what you are studying/training to become?
Which of the following best describes the occupation of the main income earner in your household?

radio.label: Z2
radio.title: ${pipe.Z2_text}
radio.row: Office-based executive - professional, managerial or other executive
Non-managerial office, sales or service worker (e.g. personal assistant, clerical, retail sales, etc.)
Highly skilled professionals (e.g. doctor, dentist, engineer, etc.)
Other skilled professionals (e.g. teacher, nurse, police officer, fire fighter, etc.)
Highly skilled tradespersons (e.g. builder, plumber, electrician, mechanic, etc.)
Other skilled or semi-skilled tradespersons (e.g. hairdresser, printer, florist, etc.)
Plant or machine operator, driver or other transport worker

radio.label: Z2a
radio.title: HIDDEN QUESTION – EMPLOYMENT TYPE

radio.label: Z3
radio.title: Which of the following ranges best describes your total yearly household income before tax?

checkbox.label: Z3a
checkbox.title: Which ethic group(s) do you belong to?

radio.label: Z4
radio.title: How much do you agree or disagree with the following statements?
radio.comment: Please select one answer only in each row.
radio.row: When I find a new product I really like I have to tell others all about it
The brands I choose are important to me as I believe they say a lot about me
I love searching out new products
